title: Hyakko
overview:
On their first day of high school shy Ayumi
 Nonomura and taciturn Tatsuki Iizuka become lost on the immense campus 
of Kamizono Academy. An irresistible force of nature named Torako 
Kageyama accompanied by her best friend Suzume Saotome appears in front 
of them. Led, sometimes pushed, by Torako, the girls and their 
classmates work through problems of school, home and adolescence.
